name: Recognize This
description:
Recognize This is a fun online multiplayer pictorial quiz game and it all comes down to YOU to identify who or what is on the image as quickly as possible.

You play matches against your friends or against random players across the world. Choose between different categories such as Artists, Actors or Flags of the World. You will be given a series of five blurred images which slowly become more and more clear, and four possible answers to choose from for each image. When you're done, your opponent plays the same series of images trying to beat your score.

Recognize This is FREE, just download it and start playing. :-)

- Connect with Facebook to play against your friends.
- New images and categories are added continuously.

Enjoy!
